name: array-ts
description: ArrayTs is a TypeScript library which enhances the JavaScript array type by exposing extension methods, similar to the IEnumerable<T> interface in Microsoft's .NET Core framework. The generic Array<T> interface is being extended for ArrayTs implementation of the IEnumerable<T> interface features, exposed to the JavaScript array type.

scripts.build-cli: browserify -p [ tsify --allowJs ] -t deamdify -t es6ify -t deglobalify -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header true ] -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ uglifyify -x .js -x .coffee ] -p exorcist -p tinyify --standalone ArrayTs dist/src/classes/ArrayTs.js > array-ts.map.js > array-ts.min.js
scripts.watch: watchify dist/src/classes/ArrayTs.js -o  '-p [ tsify --allowJs ] -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header true ] -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ uglifyify -x .js -x .coffee ] -p exorcist -p tinyify -standalone ArrayTs dist/src/classes/ArrayTs.js > array-ts.map.js > array-ts.min.js'

author: Ryan Mauldin, Jack Godwin
